legal.privacy_intro: At ClueGo, we care about your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect and how we use it.
legal.privacy_collect_text: We collect information such as your email, username, and the experiences you create or play.
legal.privacy_use_text: We use your data to improve your experience, save your progress, and offer personalized features.
legal.privacy_rights_text: You may request to modify or delete your account and personal data at any time.
legal.privacy_cookies_text: We use cookies to remember your session and language preferences.
legal.terms_intro: By using ClueGo, you agree to the following terms.
legal.terms_allowed_text: You may create and play experiences, share links, and use the app for personal or educational purposes.
legal.terms_not_allowed_text: You may not create illegal content, infringe copyright, or use the app to harass or cause harm.
legal.terms_liability_text: ClueGo is not responsible for damages, losses, or accidents caused by user-created experiences.
legal.terms_accounts_text: We may suspend accounts that misuse the platform. You may delete your account at any time.
